validationRules.block_id: Required. Unique identifier for the accordion block.
validationRules.accordianList: Required array with minimum 1 item. Each item needs title and desc (or contentType: 'template' with blockTemp).
validationRules.accordianList[].title: Required. Accordion header text. Supports plain text (HTML stripped in display).
validationRules.accordianList[].contentType: Values: 'content' (default, uses desc), 'template' (uses blockTemp for reusable blocks).
validationRules.accordianList[].desc:
Required when contentType: 'content'. Supports HTML including

,

    , , etc.
validationRules.accordianList[].innerIcon: Boolean. When true, requires iconFonts and innericonName.
validationRules.accordianList[].innericonName: Required when innerIcon: true. FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fas fa-home').
validationRules.accordianList[].stepImage: Optional. Used only when markupSch: true for How-To schema step images.
validationRules.toggleIcon: Boolean. When true, shows iconName/ActiconName toggle indicators.
validationRules.iconName: FontAwesome class for closed state. Default: 'fas fa-plus'. Only shows when toggleIcon: true.
validationRules.ActiconName: FontAwesome class for open state. Default: 'fas fa-minus'. Only shows when toggleIcon: true.
validationRules.iconAlign: Values: 'start' (left), 'end' (right). Default: 'end'. Position of toggle icons.
validationRules.defaultAct: String index of accordion item to open by default. '0' = first, '1' = second, etc. Empty '' = all closed.
validationRules.onHvrtab: Values: 'click' (default), 'hover'. How accordion activates. Hover not recommended for mobile.
validationRules.atOneOpen: Boolean. When true, opening one panel auto-closes others. Default: false (multiple can be open).
validationRules.expCollBtn: Boolean. When true, shows expand/collapse all button.
validationRules.collBtnPos: Values: 'before', 'after'. Position of expand/collapse button. Default: 'before'.
validationRules.collapseText: Button text when panels are expanded. Default: 'Collapse All'.
validationRules.expandText: Button text when panels are collapsed. Default: 'Expand All'.
validationRules.markupSch: Boolean. When true, adds How-To schema structured data for SEO. Requires howTotitle, howTodesc.
validationRules.howTotitle: Required when markupSch: true. How-To schema title (appears in search results).
validationRules.howTodesc: Required when markupSch: true. How-To schema description.
validationRules.howToimg: Optional image object for How-To schema featured image. Object with url property.
validationRules.accorBetspace: Spacing between accordion items. Responsive object. Recommended: 5-15px. Default: 5px.

warnings: CRITICAL: Never modify block_id - causes accordion to break and lose all content.
Setting multiple items with defaultAct when atOneOpen: true will only open the first matching item.
onHvrtab: 'hover' does NOT work on mobile devices - always falls back to click on touch screens.
innerIcon: true requires iconFonts and innericonName to be set, otherwise no icon appears.
toggleIcon: true without iconName/ActiconName will use defaults ('fas fa-plus'/'fas fa-minus').
markupSch: true requires howTotitle and howTodesc to be set for valid schema markup.
Accordion items with contentType: 'template' require blockTemp to be set to valid reusable block ID.
Very large accordianList arrays (50+ items) can cause performance issues - consider pagination.
atOneOpen: false allows all panels to be open simultaneously - can create very long pages.
Combining onHvrtab: 'hover' with atOneOpen: true can create rapid open/close flickering - use carefully.
titleActbgtype.openBg must be 1 to show active background. Default has openBg: 1, bgDefaultColor: '#f7f7f7'.
hoverStyle requires specific values: 'none', 'style-1', 'style-2'. Other values ignored.
commonMistakes: Setting defaultAct to number (0, 1, 2) instead of string ('0', '1', '2') - must be string
Forgetting to enable toggleIcon but setting iconName/ActiconName (icons won't appear)
Using defaultAct with non-existent index (e.g., '5' when only 3 items) - accordion will be empty
Setting innerIcon: true without innericonName - leaves blank space where icon should be
Not setting openTypography: 1 before customizing titleTypo/descTypo (typography ignored)
Using px units for responsive accordion on mobile - consider rem/em for better scaling
Forgetting to set openBg: 1 for titlebgType/descbgType (backgrounds don't appear)
Setting very small accorBetspace (0-2px) - accordion items look cramped and hard to distinguish
Using onHvrtab: 'hover' without testing on mobile - creates poor UX on touch devices
Not providing step images when markupSch: true - schema still valid but less rich
bestPractices: Accordion spacing: 5-12px (accorBetspace) for comfortable visual separation
Title padding: 15-25px all sides for comfortable click targets (especially mobile)
Content padding: 20-25px for comfortable reading space
Toggle icon size: 14-18px for visibility without overwhelming text
Toggle icon gap: 10-15px (tgiconGap) for visual separation from text
Inner icon size: 18-24px when using innerIcon per item
Title typography: 16-20px font size, 600-700 font weight for emphasis
Content typography: 14-16px font size, 1.6-1.8 line height for readability
Use atOneOpen: true for step-by-step guides (only one step visible at a time)
Use atOneOpen: false for FAQ (users may want to compare multiple answers)
Set defaultAct to highlight new/important content on page load
Use markupSch: true for tutorials/guides to improve SEO with rich results
Icon alignment: iconAlign: 'start' for LTR content emphasizing icons, 'end' for minimalist design
Hover activation: Only use onHvrtab: 'hover' for desktop-only experiences
Expand/collapse button: Use expCollBtn: true for 5+ accordion items for better UX
Color contrast: Ensure titleColor vs titlebgType has 4.5:1 minimum contrast (WCAG AA)
Active state: Use distinct titleActcolor/titleActbgtype so users know which panel is open
Limit accordion items: 20-30 items maximum - beyond that, use pagination or search
Mobile optimization: Test responsive breakpoints (sm/xs) for titleTypo/descTypo
Border radius: 5-10px (titleBradius/descBRedius) for modern rounded appearance

layoutContext.parentBlocks: Can be used in any container (tp-container, tp-row/tp-column, tp-container-inner)
layoutContext.childBlocks: None - self-contained accordion. Can use innerBlocks when contentType: 'template'
layoutContext.siblingBlocks: Often paired with tp-heading above for section titles
layoutContext.accordianListBehavior: Each item in array generates a separate accordion panel. Minimum 1 item required.
layoutContext.toggleIconBehavior: When toggleIcon: true, icons switch between iconName (closed) and ActiconName (open). Uses CSS transform for smooth rotation.
layoutContext.innerIconBehavior: When innerIcon: true per item, icon appears before title text. Different from toggleIcon which appears on opposite side.
layoutContext.defaultActBehavior: String index ('0', '1', etc.) specifies which panel opens on page load. Empty string = all closed. Works with atOneOpen.
layoutContext.atOneOpenBehavior: When true, uses accordion pattern (one open at a time). When false, uses collapse pattern (multiple open).
layoutContext.hoverStyleBehavior: Adds visual hover effects. 'style-1' = underline, 'style-2' = different effect. Color controlled by hoverColor.

performanceConsiderations: Large accordianList arrays (50+ items) can slow initial page render - consider lazy loading
FontAwesome icons load from icon font - ensure font is loaded before accordion renders
Gradient backgrounds (titlebgType/descbgType with bgType: 'gradient') are CSS-based - minimal performance impact
Box shadows on every item can impact scroll performance on low-end devices - use sparingly
How-To schema (markupSch: true) adds ~2-5KB of structured data to page - minimal impact
Hover activation (onHvrtab: 'hover') requires JavaScript event listeners on all items - slight overhead
Template content (contentType: 'template') loads reusable blocks - can be heavy if blocks are complex
Very frequent toggling with animations can cause layout thrashing - test on mobile devices
accessibilityNotes: Accordion headers should use appropriate heading levels (titleTag: h2-h4) for screen reader navigation
Toggle icons (iconName/ActiconName) are decorative - ensure ARIA labels are present (plugin handles this)
Keyboard navigation: Accordion titles must be focusable with Tab, activated with Enter/Space
ARIA expanded state: Plugin automatically adds aria-expanded='true/false' to indicate panel state
Color contrast: titleColor vs titlebgType must have 4.5:1 minimum contrast ratio (WCAG AA)
Hover-only activation (onHvrtab: 'hover') is not keyboard accessible - always falls back to click
Focus indicators: Ensure visible focus state on accordion titles for keyboard users
Screen readers: Announce panel state changes (expanded/collapsed) automatically
Touch targets: Minimum 44x44px tap target size - use adequate titlePadding on mobile
How-To schema improves SEO but doesn't affect accessibility - still follow HTML semantics
